text: Ne Shetani aliboola, olwa omuse kulibusibwa, mbu; “Nyasaye yabalaka indakano yatoto, nasi nebalaka mana nekhaya okhubakholela shingala khwalakana. Ne shindalikhwo nobunyali khwinye tawe, halali ndabalanganga butswa, nanyu nimufuchilila. Kho mulafunania tawe, mwifunanie abeene. Shindakhanyala okhubakhoonya nohomba enywe shimunyala okhukhoonya tawe. Toto esie ndakhaya okhunzokasia khwenyu okhurula khale” Toto abamabii baliba nende eshinyasio eshilulu
